With Weather-Alarm you receive precise weather forecasts for Switzerland and Liechtenstein where you are warned of severe weather free of charge. Thanks to high-resolution webcams, as well as useful information on temperature, precipitation, wind and sunshine duration, the weather becomes predictable for you.

THE TOP FEATURES OF WEATHER-ALARM

● Current weather & weather forecast
● Warnings of severe weather
● Personal weather alerts
● Webcams with live weather in real time
● Weather forecast for events
● Safety tips & useful information
● Weather widgets including thermometer

CURRENT WEATHER & WEATHER PROGNOSIS

With Weather-Alarm you get local and regional weather forecasts for today and tomorrow, as well as weather outlooks for the entire week at the touch of a button. This way you always stay informed about the current weather and the weather outlook. In addition, the daily forecasts inform you about the current moon phase. With this compact lunar calendar, you will definitely not miss the next full moon.

CURRENT WEATHER SITUATION AND FORECAST	

Besides the current weather report with hourly weather forecast for today and 6 further days, a storm map, wind map, flood map and flash and rain radar provide detailed information on the weather outlook. With information on temperature, flow and water levels, Weather-Alarm also provides information on the condition of streams, rivers and lakes. Whether spring, summer, autumn or winter, the Weather-Alarm app is your ideal companion in every season.

WEATHER ALERTS

Your safety is important to us! With Weather-Alarm, you can be conveniently warned of severe weather. You decide what kind of severe weather and at what danger level you would like to be warned. Whether heavy rain, wind, storm, high water, frost, ice, snowfall, thunderstorms or hail, Weather-Alarm reliably warns you of natural hazards.

PERSONAL WEATHER ALERTS

With Weather Alert, you can set up weather notifications according to your needs. This function is ideal for not being surprised by a change in the weather on your way to work or during your leisure time. The 172 warning regions in Switzerland and Liechtenstein allow us to provide area-wide and precise warnings.

WEBCAMS WITH LIVE WEATHER

Explore the weather in Switzerland in real time. Weather-Alarm offers high-resolution, zoomable panoramic pictures of over 300 webcams (restaurants, airports, hotels, ski resorts, mountain peaks, excursion destinations). Thanks to the altitude data of the live cams, you always know the snowfall as well as the fog line and also the weather conditions in ski resorts.

WEATHER AT EVENTS

Weather-Alarm informs you about outdoor events via push notification. Add the event to your favorites and select your visit date. Organizers can register their event free of charge at: https://wetteralarm.ch/events/veranstaltungen.html

WEATHER WIDGETS

Place the Weather-Alarm widget on the home screen of your smartphone or tablet to see the weather and storm information without having to open the app. This function can be used as a thermometer.

SAFETY TIPS & BLOG

To help you avoid damage caused by severe weather, we provide useful safety tips and prevention measures. You can also find even more knowledge on the topic of weather directly in the app via the menu item "Blog".

SHARE ALERTS & IMAGES FROM WEBCAMS

Warn your loved ones by sharing severe weather warnings via messenger, email or social networks. Or forward impressive images from live cams and personal alerts.

Weather-Alarm is a free service from Kantonale Gebäudeversicherungen with weather data supplied by SRF Meteo and Meteo Swiss.

Are you looking for the perfect light for impressive photos? Are you curious to know how do professional photographers capture the moment when the light is "magic"? This app is for you! Easy and intuitive, it shows you the times of the golden and the blue hours.

Do you have to plan your own photo session or a trip? You can change your GPS location and date within the app so you know exactly when the best time is for your photos.

Features:
 - easy user interface
 - multiple locations management
 - event reminder by notifications
 - customizable notifications alert
 - no data connection required (weather excluded)
 - iOS 13+ dark mode support
 - weather forecasts
 - moon phases

The Golden hour, also known as magic hour corresponds to a special and sought after condition of natural sunlight with a high diffusion, warm temperature, low incidence and limited energy. In photography the golden hour translates into soft light, warm colors, shadows so long that they tend to disappear and a good level of contrast despite the reduced dynamics. Its opposite is the Blue hour that identifies a specific condition of the solar light characterized by a colder temperature and a low energy, which, in practical terms, results in subjects with numerous penumbra, de-saturated and colder colors and intense blue sky. The golden hour occurs when the sun is very low on the horizon and therefore in the moments after sunrise and before sunset, the blue hour instead at sunset or sunrise, in twilight situation, when the sun it's below the horizon. The time, duration and intensity of these "magical hours" change according to the seasons, latitudes and weather conditions and therefore this app will help you to identify them perfectly.

The app combines highly accurate weather forecast for your location with a 3D map showing development of weather in a broader area in a very interesting way. This allows you to see where precipitation is going to come from or where the wind is blowing from. The uniqueness of the app comes from the amount of data displayed. Forecast of weather, precipitation, wind, cloud cover, atmospheric pressure, snow cover and other meteorological data for different altitudes is available for the whole world. 

WIND ANIMATION
The Ventusky application solves weather displaying in an interesting way. Wind is displayed using streamlines which clearly portray the continuous development of weather. Airflow on Earth is always in motion and the streamlines depict this motion in an amazing way. This makes the interconnection of all atmospheric phenomena obvious.

WEATHER FORECAST
Weather forecast for the first three days is available in the app in one-hour steps. For other days, it’s available in three-hour steps. Users can also look up sunrise and sunrise times in a given place or air quality.

WEATHER MODELS
Thanks to the Ventusky application, visitors get data directly from the numerical models that, just a few years ago, were used solely by meteorologists. The app collects data from the most accurate numerical models. Besides the well-known data from the American GFS and HRRR models, it also displays data from the Canadian GEM model and the German ICON model, which is unique thanks to its high resolution for the whole world. Two models, EURAD and USRAD, are based on current radar and satellite readings. These models are able to show precisely current precipitation in US and Europe.

WEATHER FRONTS
You can also display weather fronts. We have created a neural network that predicts the positions of cold, warm, occluded, and stationary fronts based on data from weather models. This algorithm is unique, and we are the first on the world who makes global fronts forecast available to users.

LIST OF WEATHER LAYERS
• Temperature (16 levels)
• Temperature anomaly
• Perceived temperature
• Precipitation (1 hour, 3 hour, long time accumulation)
• Radar
• Satellite
• Wind gusts (1 hour, long time maximum)
• Air quality (AQI, NO2, SO2, PM10, PM2.5, O3, dust or CO)
• Probability of aurora

LIST OF WEATHER LAYERS (PREMIUM)
• Wind (16 levels)

• Snow cover (total, new)

• Dew point

• Freezing level
• Wave forecast
• Ocean currents

LIST OF WEATHER WIDGETS

Protect yourself when the UV is at damaging levels with the SunSmart Global UV app.
Powered by world leading health, radiation and weather organisations, the app provides worldwide UV levels and clear guidance as to when sun protection is and is not required.
Travelling and spending time outdoors is one of life’s great joys. Knowing when sun protection is recommended wherever you are in the world gives you confidence to enjoy the sun safely, minimizing the risk of skin damage which can lead to cancer. 
The SunSmart Global UV app takes the guesswork out of being safe in the sun with daily sun protection times sent to your phone along with simple advice for protecting your skin.
What are sun protection times?
Sun protection times are linked to the UV Index and are advised when the UV is forecast to be 3 and above. This is consistent with the WHO UV Index guidance and has been determined as the level at which damage to the skin is likely to occur more quickly.
The app will advise you that sun protection is required during specific times when the UV is forecast to be 3 and above so that you can adequately protect your skin.
How is it different to other UV apps?
It is the only UV app that has the backing and credibility of the World Meteorological Organization making it a truly trusted and reliable source.
Unlike other apps, the SunSmart Global UV app is designed to simply inform users when sun protection is required and when it is not.

Stay connected on the go with the RWIS app, bVision native app! Thanks to our app, you can keep an eye on your surface condition and your field services at all time. Displayed on an interactive map, the RWIS app is the perfect tool for on the field visualization. RWIS gives you the power of bVision, in your pocket.

Live situation
With the RWIS app, you can always keep an eye on your organization, wherever you are. From the field to the office, the RWIS app enable a quick analysis of your surface conditions and your field services directly on your smartphone. From your weather stations, to your vehicles and staff, you can monitor the current situation in your organization anytime, anywhere. Stay on top of your game thanks to the RWIS app.

Map overview
Thanks to our user-friendly map interface, you can keep an eye on your organization. All of your interventions, vehicles and weather stations are displayed on a map for you to analyze. With a simple tap on a map element, you can access more information about your intervention or station. With a second tap, you have access to all the details you need about your intervention or station. Easily accessible on a familiar map, RWIS app allows for a perfect analysis of the situation of your organization. Use map, satellite or traffic layers to gain more insights about your environment.

Interventions
Visualize all your ongoing interventions directly on your smartphone thanks to the RWIS app. The route taken by your vehicle or operator is displayed on the map. Moreover, this route is colored based on ongoing activities. The current position of the intervention is displayed directly on the map with a colored arrow head. More than just knowing what was carried out during the intervention, the details screen enable you to know which equipment are currently in use.

Fleet management
More than just data on a map, the RWIS app enables you to keep an eye on your fleet. You can now know which vehicles are currently in use, where they are and what they are doing directly from your smartphone. Thanks to the RWIS app, you have all the knowledge you need to reach informed decisions.

Weather station
More than just interventions, the RWIS app displays all of your RWIS or AWIS weather stations directly on the map for a perfect analysis of the situation. Get your Boschung ice early warning alarms, the precipitation type and intensity, water depth on the surface, road and air temperature and much more data from your weather station. Our user-friendly screen enables a quick analysis of the current data of your RWIS or AWIS stations as well as graphical view showing you the evolution of all data during the last 2 hours. Even better, if you have a camera on your station, you can directly visualize it from the same screen. Thanks to the RWIS app, you have all the information for your decision-making process!

Public weather stations
Thanks to several customers and partners believing in data sharing, we built an ever-growing network of public weather stations. For those public stations, you have access to several data such as precipitation type and intensity, water depth on the surface as well as road and air temperature.

bMoves integration
For you to keep a track of your field services, the RWIS app offers now a native integration with the field services management solution bMoves. With bMoves, you can gain valuable insights onto what your staff is doing, where and when.

L’application MétéoBat VD utilise les données météorologiques fournies en collaboration avec MétéoSuisse dans le but d’informer l’utilisateur/trice des conditions météorologiques actuelles et prévisionnelles sur son lieu de travail. Cette application cible les travailleuses et travailleurs de la Construction œuvrant sur le canton de Vaud. L’utilisateur/trice reçoit selon sa volonté des notifications de type « push » en fonctions de lieux choisis ou de la position géographique de son lieu de travail.

Le but de notre application est d’informer l’utilisateur/trice en cas de conditions météorologiques d’intempéries telles que fortes pluies ou neige par exemple et de permettre ainsi aux entreprises de prendre les mesures nécessaires pour l’adaptation ou l’arrêt des travaux sur le lieu de travail, dans le but d’assurer la santé et la sécurité des travailleurs.euses.

L’application MétéoBat VD ne constitue pas une base légale pour toute revendication ou prétention concernant l’interruption du travail ou le droit à l’indemnisation des jours d’intempéries et doit être utilisée dans un but d’information basée sur des critères météorologiques clairement définis relatifs aux intempéries.

Cette application est le fruit du partenariat entre l’Etat de Vaud, la Fédération Vaudoise des Entrepreneurs et le syndicat Unia région Vaud.

*** AeroWeather: for pilots, aviation enthusiasts, and everyone who is serious about the weather!
*** Current and precise weather conditions (METAR) and forecasts (TAF).

AeroWeather Lite provides quick and intuitive access to METAR and TAF for airports worldwide. Data can be shown in its original (raw) format or as fully decoded and easy understandable texts. AeroWeather Lite is helpful for weather preflight-briefings, but also to just get very precise weather. All weather data is cached for offline access. There are many settings for units and format of METAR/TAF available.

The app features a built-in airport database, which includes basic airport data like sunrise/sunset, twilight times, timezones etc. 

AeroWeather Lite offers built-in groups for nearby stations, today widget (pre iOS 14), and earthquakes. Depending on your needs, groups can be shown or hidden in the main list view.

METAR alert notifications** is an helpful feature to stay up-to-date. Define multiple alerts for each station with the following criteria: flight rule (US NOAA), wind speed, temperature, pressure, present weather, visibility, and ceiling (BKN and OVC). Notifications will be sent to your device if the criteria is met (e.g., when wind is greater/equal 10 kts, flight rule becomes IFR).

Dedicated METAR/TAF** access is optionally available. METAR/TAF data comes primarily from a certified ANSP (air navigation service provider) and is provided reliably and fast from our dedicated, redundant servers (indicated by blue checkmark underneath METAR/TAF).

The AeroPix feature offers users the possibility to take quickly picture(s) of the weather at their current location. The pictures will be available to all other pilots (on the map or within an airport detail view) helping them to get a better idea about local conditions. AeroPix should be especially helpful when there's no or insufficient webcam coverage.

There's also an iMessage app included which lets you easily send METAR/TAF of any airport to other users.

Are you looking for the Aurora app that is not just about the forecast? Hello aurora is a mobile application that will act as your best friend when it comes to finding the Northern Lights.

Many of you may feel exhausted and lost when trying to understand the possibility of seeing the Northern Lights. You can forget about the unnecessary worries now! Because you will have everything you need for Northern Lights hunting in one app and can also share your aurora experience and connect with others aurora lovers! Here is what hello aurora can help you: 

* Real-time aurora forecast: data updated every few minutes from accurate real-time sources.
* Northern Lights Locations: Users can see and share their locations when spotted the Northern Lights. 
* Aurora Moments: Share the photo of the aurora you are seeing to other users with location, time, and aurora strength and choose emoji to react to the photos.
* Connect with aurora lovers: add information to your profile and get to know other enthusiasts.
* Your aurora hunting stats: keep your aurora stats such as how many aurora you have seen, your moments shared, and see how many people have seen your moments.
* Northern Lights alert: Notification sends to users when the aurora is visible at their location. 
* Aurora possibility: display the chance of seeing the Northern Lights. 
* Aurora Oval: Aurora belt display on the map screen.

If you are wandering around one of the north pole countries on a cold winter night, you will like to download this Northern Lights app and bring it around with you on your trip.

This app uses the barometric pressure sensor built into all the newer iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch Models sold after 2016 with few exceptions. You need one of these newer devices to use this App. See below which older iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch without this sensor are not supported!

This App features a Barometer for weather, an Altimeter for outdoor activities, a barometric Trend and a Notification Center Widget.

Even without the optional In-App-Purchase this is a fully functional Barometer with absolutely no draw-backs and all important features accessible. Always without ads! (See "Pro Features" at the end). No internet connection required, no data transmitted - runs on your device only!

Keep an eye on the barometric pressure and be your own weather forecast! This little app uses only GPS (optional) and the new barometric pressure sensor to calculate the barometric pressure used in weather forecasts. The new iPhones have a barometric pressure sensor built in so this app works completely without internet. The handy marker helps you keep track of changes in the barometric pressure and let's you predict weather changes! Please realize, that a single barometric pressure reading is not enough to tell the current weather situation but the barometric pressure and its change over time is a very good indicator for weather changes!

Now you can also see the trend in barometric pressure with graph charts displaying the measurements taken during the last 30 days! (6h, 12h, 24h, 3d, 7d, 14d, 30d)

The Altimeter helps you track your altitude changes based on the change of pressure. Just set your reference pressure and altitude in order to use the Altimeter for checking how high up the mountain you have climbed (works for other activities too). The App does not use GPS for the Altimeter.

Please Note that on older devices such as the 4S, 5, 5S and 5C as well as on any iPod Touch and iPad Models older than iPad Air 2 or iPad Mini 4 as well as the Apple Watch 1 and 2, this app will not be able to read barometric pressure values and not display any useful information. The first generation 4-inch iPhone SE is not supported - the new SE (2020) is!

All basic features, the Barometer, the Altimeter, the Trend and the Widget are completely free to use for everyone and are fully functional at maximum accuracy available. No ads!
The only features with restricted access via In-App-Purchase are listed at the end under "Pro Features". Those are nice to have features for power users or those that want to show their support for the App!

Features (free for everyone)
- Barometer for weather

- Supports 6 different pressure units

- Configurable "displayed accuracy" / number of decimals
- Supports setting a custom marker so you can track changes in barometric pressure

Barometer Plus app measures air pressure and altitude using your device's built-in barometric pressure sensor.
Because air pressure changes usually indicate a weather change, you can use this app to monitor and predict short-term weather variations.
People suffering from migraine, headaches, or joint pain can monitor how barometric pressure impacts their mood.
Fishermen can monitor the atmospheric pressure for right-time fishing.

FEATURES:
• The app contains a barometer and altimeter with a personalization graphic in classic analog style. It also displays the current temperature and humidity.
• Display barometric pressure (sensor value) or mean sea level pressure (MSLP - value used in weather forecast services or stations).
• Units support for pressure: mb, inHg, kPa, atm, Torr, psi, hPa, mmHg. Units for altitude: meter, feet.
• Calibrate the barometer using altitude/location from the GPS. Calibrate the altimeter using the nearest airport information/METAR, or manually enter the QNH of the nearest airport. Offset sensor output value.
• Measure the height (building/mountain/hiked/climbed) using the "Relative Altitude" feature (can be enabled in the app's Settings).
• Notification about pressure change. "Notification custom rule" for you to define how and when the app sends notifications.
Notify when air pressure changes indicate that extreme or worse weather may occur.
• "Pressure Tracking" and "History Graph" require "Background App Refresh" or "Always Location Service" with "Exact update interval" (paid feature) enabled.
• "My Area" allows you to define your frequent stay places, and the app tracks air pressure with location data.
• Export history to CSV format and Today widget (paid features).
• This app is the digital version compared with an aneroid or mercury barometer and can be adjusted to MSLP with additional features.

CUSTOMIZABLE:
You can change your barometer/altimeter appearance with:
• Seven different housing colors.
• Black, white or blue disk background.
• Four different app backgrounds.
• Three different types of needles.
• Marker needle for easily monitor.
• Dark or light Today widget theme.

NOTES:
• App only works on devices with a barometer sensor, such as iPhone 6/6s/7/8/X/11/12/13 (including Plus models), iPad Mini 4/Air 2/Pro, or later.
• Weather icons on the dial: This only shows the air pressure trend like in an analog barometer.
• Each time your device reboots, open the app for tracking with the "Exact update interval" feature work.
• You may take the phone/tablet far away from computers, cables, and other magnetic sources to get accurate results.
